snippet.title: The House In The Hollow - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The 𝗛𝗼𝘂𝘀𝗲 𝗜𝗻 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗛𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗼𝘄 offers players an immersive, first person, playing experience.

Explore an atmospheric location including an imposing Art Nouveau manor house and its surrounding forest in the mysterious void called the Hollow.

The game combines the power of the Unreal Engine, with player exploration, in order to unravel the mystery of what happened to the reclusive English magician and occultist, Francis Barrett.

Can you solve the mystery and escape the hollow?

𝗪𝗶𝘀𝗵𝗹𝗶𝘀𝘁 𝗢𝗻 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺 - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1152710/The_House_In_The_Hollow/
𝗪𝗲𝗯𝘀𝗶𝘁𝗲 - https://thehouseinthehollow.com/
𝗙𝗮𝗰𝗲𝗯𝗼𝗼𝗸 - https://www.facebook.com/HouseInHollow/
𝗧𝘄𝗶𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿 - https://twitter.com/HouseInHollow
